MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8pm to repair an underground cable fault on Manor Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:46PM on Thursday 08 April 2021.
